Summary: Help System with Feedback, Connection Stability, and Performance Improvements.
Details:
Help System with User Feedback

What's new:

  • Built-in Documentation: Access comprehensive help directly within the application through the Help menu.
  • Submit Feedback: Easily submit bug reports, feature suggestions, questions, and inconsistency reports.
  • Modern Interface: Clean, searchable help system with categories for all major features.

Startup Performance Boost

What's new:

  • 5.6 Seconds Faster: Application now starts approximately 5.6 seconds faster than before.
  • Smoother Animation: Splash screen to main window transition reduced from 500ms to 50ms.
  • Instant QuickButtons: QuickButtons load without visible delay or placeholder flicker.

Connection Stability

What's new:

  • No More 'Max Users Reached': Comprehensive system prevents database connection exhaustion.
  • 50% Faster Transactions: Optimized database operations for improved speed.
  • Automatic Monitoring: Connection statistics tracked every 5 minutes.

Enhanced Application Launch

What's new:

  • Smart Instance Management: Only one copy can run at a time.
  • Window Activation: Double-clicking brings existing window to front.
  • Reliable Restarts: Settings restart works smoothly without errors.

Summary: Print Preview sorting and reliability improvements.
Details:
Print Preview Improvements

What's new:

  • Sort By Dropdown: You can now sort your print previews by any visible column using the new dropdown menu.
  • Smart Sorting: Sorting applies to the entire dataset, ensuring your report is organized exactly how you need it.
  • Reliability: Fixed issues where large reports could cause timeouts or crashes.

Summary: New Infor Visual Dashboard with Receiving Analytics, Inventory Audit, and Die Tool Discovery.
Details:
Infor Visual Dashboard

What's new:

  • Centralized Hub: Access all your visual tools and analytics from a single dashboard.
  • Receiving Analytics: Track receiving performance, view Purchase Order details, and analyze trends with interactive charts.
  • Inventory Audit: Easily audit inventory, search transactions, and export data for reporting.
  • Die Tool Discovery: Quickly search for dies and tools with the new dedicated search tool.
  • User Analytics: Track material handler performance and quality metrics to improve efficiency.

Summary: QuickButtons visual improvements and theme system refinements.
Details:
Clearer QuickButtons

What's new:

  • Better Shortcut Display: Complex hotkeys like "Shift+Alt+F1" now display on multiple lines so they're easier to read.
  • Detailed Tooltips: Hover over any QuickButton to see the full Part Number, Operation, Quantity, and Hotkey.
  • Visual Fixes: Buttons now look correct regardless of which theme you're using.

Summary: Startup architecture modernization and service refactoring.
Details:
Startup Reliability

What's new:

  • Robust Startup Sequence: The application now checks for database connectivity, user permissions, and system requirements in a strict order before showing the main window.
  • Better Error Handling: If something goes wrong during startup, you'll get a clear, helpful error message instead of a crash.
  • Service Organization: Internal code has been reorganized for better performance and maintainability.

Summary: System reliability improvements, centralized grid system, smart transaction deletion, and enhanced search capabilities.
Details:
System Reliability & Support Tools

What's new:

  • Automatic Error Reporting: When an error occurs, the system now automatically sends a report to IT in the background.
  • Report Management (For IT): The Error Report Viewer now supports deleting reports.
  • Keyboard Shortcuts: You can now use the Delete key to remove reports in the viewer.

Centralized Grid System

What's new:

  • Unified Grid Logic: All data grids (Transfer, Remove, History) now use a shared service for consistent behavior.
  • Consistent Printing: Printing works exactly the same way across all tabs, with the same options and layout.
  • Standardized Theming: Grid colors and styles are now applied centrally, ensuring a uniform look.

Smart Transaction Deletion

What's new:

  • Batch Awareness: When deleting a transaction, the system now detects if it's part of a batch (e.g., related IN/OUT/TRANSFER records).
  • One-Click Cleanup: You are prompted to delete all related records in the batch automatically, keeping your data clean.

Transaction Search Improvements

What's fixed:

  • Precise Filtering: Fixed an issue where selecting specific combinations of transaction types (e.g., "IN" and "TRANSFER" only) wouldn't filter correctly.
  • Better Location Search: Smart search now better handles specific "From" and "To" location filters.

Summary: Print dialog improvements: Notes column, collapsible sidebars, and better printer reliability.
Details:
Better Printing Experience

What's new:

  • Add Notes Column: You can now add a blank "Notes" column to your printouts. This is perfect for writing down corrections or counts while walking the floor.
  • Collapsible Sidebars: Need to see more of the preview? You can now collapse the left and right settings panels to maximize the view.
  • Improved Reliability: The print dialog no longer freezes if your selected printer is offline. It handles connection issues gracefully.
  • Smarter Defaults: If you add a Notes column, the system suggests switching to Landscape mode for better fit.

Why this helps:

  • Paper Workflow: The new Notes column bridges the gap between digital data and physical inventory checks.
  • Better Visibility: See your document clearly without settings panels taking up space.
  • Less Frustration: No more application freezes when a printer is acting up.

Summary: User Management screen updated to match new card interface style.
Details:
Consistent User Management

What's new:

  • Unified "Manage Users" Link: The Settings Home page now has a single "Manage Users" link, just like Parts and Locations.
  • Improved Navigation: Added a "Home" button to the User Management screen to quickly return to the main Settings menu.
  • Consistent Behavior: User Management now works exactly like the other new management screens (Parts, Locations, Operations).

Why this helps:

  • Less Confusion: All settings screens now look and behave the same way.
  • Easier Navigation: Move between screens and back to home with fewer clicks.

Summary: Complete redesign of Settings management screens with modern card interface.
Details:
Modern Settings Management

What's new:

  • Unified Management Screens: We've combined the separate "Add", "Edit", and "Remove" tabs into single, easy-to-use management hubs.
  • Card-Based Navigation: Large, clear tiles help you choose exactly what you want to do (Add üè¢, Edit ‚úèÔ∏è, or Remove üóëÔ∏è).
  • Consistent Experience: Managing Parts, Locations, Operations, and Item Types now works exactly the same way.
  • Smart "Back" Navigation: Easily return to the main selection screen without losing your place.

Where to see it:

  • Settings ‚Üí Part Numbers
  • Settings ‚Üí Locations
  • Settings ‚Üí Operations
  • Settings ‚Üí Item Types

Why this helps:

  • Less Clutter: The Settings tree menu is much cleaner (no more long lists of "Add/Edit/Remove" sub-items).
  • Faster Workflow: Get in, make your change, and get out with fewer clicks.
  • Better Feedback: Improved validation and status messages keep you informed.
  • Modern Look: Matches the clean design of the main application dashboard.

Summary: Search buttons added to all main entry tabs for quick access to full lists.
Details:
Quick Access Search Buttons on All Tabs

What's new:

  • üîé Search buttons added next to key fields on Inventory, Transfer, and Remove tabs
  • Smart behavior: Buttons adapt based on whether the field has text
  • Mouse-friendly alternative to pressing F4 on the keyboard
  • Consistent across all tabs - same helpful buttons everywhere

Where they appear:

  • Inventory Tab: Part Number, Operation, Location, Color Code (4 buttons)
  • Transfer Tab: Part Number, Operation, To Location (3 buttons)
  • Remove Tab: Part Number, Operation (2 buttons)

How to use them:

  1. When field is empty: Click üîé button ‚Üí Opens full dropdown list (same as pressing F4)
  2. When field has text: Click üîé button ‚Üí Moves to next field (same as pressing Enter)

Why this helps:

  • Less keyboard needed - mouse users can access dropdowns without touching F4 key
  • Faster navigation - one click moves you forward when you're done
  • Clearer interface - easy to see where you can get help finding values
  • Consistent experience - same buttons work the same way on every tab

Summary: Advanced Inventory Entry modernized with smart suggestions and Excel auto-template.
Details:
Advanced Inventory Entry Gets Smart Suggestions

What's new:

  • Type-to-search now works in Advanced Inventory Entry
  • Smart Part/Operation/Location fields replace the old dropdown menus
  • üîé Search buttons next to each field
  • Keyboard shortcuts: Press F4 to open suggestions, or just start typing
  • Row deletion with confirmation: Select a preview row and press Delete key to remove it

Excel Import Template Auto-Creation

What's new:

  • Excel template created automatically when you open Advanced Inventory Entry
  • No more "file not found" errors when trying to import
  • Ready-to-use structure with proper column headers

Summary: Universal suggestions, smart confirmations, and focus highlighting improvements.
Details:
Intelligent Part Number, Operation, and Location Entry

What's new:

  • Type to find: Start typing in Part Number, Operation, or Location and matching options appear instantly
  • Works the way you type: Partial matches are supported
  • Keyboard friendly: Use the arrow keys to move, Enter to select, Escape to cancel

Smart Deletion and Transfer Confirmation

What's new:

  • Confirmation before any deletion or transfer
  • Smart grouping for multiple items
  • Clear summary: See exactly what will be deleted or transferred before it happens

Focus Highlighting Improvements

What's fixed:

  • Transfer Tab Location field: Focus highlighting now works on the To Location field
  • Consistent highlighting: All text input fields now highlight properly when focused

Summary: Themes update instantly and reliably across all forms.
Details:
Lightning-Fast Theme Changes

What's new:

  • Instant theme updates: Theme changes now apply in under 100 milliseconds
  • Automatic updates everywhere: When you change your theme, ALL open windows update automatically
  • Live preview: In Settings ‚Üí Theme tab, see your theme change in real-time

What's better now:

  • No more manual refresh: Old system required closing and reopening forms to see theme changes
  • Memory efficient: New system uses 10% less memory
  • Performance optimized: Theme application is 3x faster

Summary: Theme selection now saves correctly and remembers your choice.
Details:
Theme Selection Now Saves Properly

What's fixed:

  • Your theme choice is remembered: When you change your theme in Settings, it now saves correctly
  • No more reverting to default: Fixed issue where theme selection would reset to "Lavender"

What's better now:

  • Pick your theme and keep it: Choose any of the 9 available themes and your choice is saved
  • Instant application: Theme applies immediately when you click Save

Summary: QuickButtons now work perfectly - fixes for duplicates, display issues, and save order.
Details:
QuickButtons Are Now 100% Reliable

What's fixed:

  • No more duplicate buttons: Fixed issue where the same part/operation would appear multiple times
  • Proper display when clicking buttons: QuickButtons now fill in Part Number and Operation fields correctly
  • Edit dialog with smart dropdowns: Right‚Äëclick Edit now shows dropdowns with type‚Äëto‚Äësearch
  • New buttons appear at top: When you save a transaction as a QuickButton, it now appears at the top

Summary: Complete redesign of Transaction History Viewer with major performance and usability improvements.
Details:
Settings Form Now Works for All Users

What's fixed:

  • Settings form no longer crashes when opening
  • Fixed database connection switching issue
  • Environment-aware server selection

Easier User Management

What's fixed:

  • Faster user deletion
  • Cleaner process

Simplified Part Number Management

What's fixed:

  • Only 2 required fields: Part Number and Item Type
  • Item Type defaults to "WIP"

Summary: User Management, Part Number Management, and Settings Form improvements.
Details:
Settings Form Now Works for All Users

What's New:

  • Modern 3-panel layout
  • Lightning fast searches
  • Advanced filtering
  • Smart pagination

Transaction Analytics Summary (NEW!)

What's New:

  • Real-time statistics displayed above the search results
  • Summary cards show totals for current date range

Summary: New error report management system for developers.
Details:
For IT Support and Developers: Manage User-Reported Issues

New "View Error Reports" feature:

  • Browse all error reports submitted by users in one place
  • Search and filter by date, user, machine, or error type
  • View complete details including what the user was doing

Summary: New error reporting feature.
Details:
Help Us Fix Problems Faster

New "Report Issue" button in error messages:

  • When something goes wrong, you'll see a "Report Issue" button
  • Click it to tell us what you were doing when the error happened

Works Even When Network is Down

Don't worry about losing reports:

  • If the network is down, your report is saved locally

Summary: Better error tracking with computer names.
Details:
Automatic Computer Name Tracking

What's new:

  • When you submit an error report, the system now automatically records which computer you're using
  • Shows the actual computer name

Why this helps:

  • IT can troubleshoot faster
  • Identify problem machines

Summary: Display scaling improvements.
Details:
Better Display on Different Monitors and Screen Scaling

If you use multiple monitors:

  • The application now asks before automatically resizing when display scaling changes

Error Messages Look Right Now

What's fixed: Error messages now appear at the right size on all screens

Summary: Database layer modernization - comprehensive refactoring.
Details:
Modernized Database Architecture

Major behind-the-scenes overhaul completed:

  • 60+ stored procedures standardized
  • 12 Data Access Objects (DAOs) refactored
  • 220+ database call sites updated

What this prevents:

  • MySQL parameter errors
  • Data corruption
  • Application crashes

Version: Items not included above Part 1 of 5
Summary: System Reliability: Connection monitoring and centralized error reporting.
Details:
System Health & Monitoring

Connection Strength Monitor:

  • Real-time Signal: New indicator in the status bar shows database connection quality.
  • Auto-Recovery: System automatically attempts to reconnect if the network drops.

Centralized Error Reporting:

  • No More Crashes: Replaced generic crash dialogs with a robust error handler.
  • Detailed Logs: Errors are now logged with full stack traces and user context for IT support.

Version: Items not included above Part 2 of 5
Summary: Transaction Viewer: A powerful replacement for Personal History.
Details:
Transaction Intelligence

Global Search & Filtering:

  • Beyond Personal History: Search across ALL transactions in the system, not just your own.
  • Advanced Filters: Filter by Part Number, User, Date Range, or Transaction Type.

Analytics Dashboard:

  • Visual Insights: Real-time charts showing Total IN, OUT, and TRANSFER operations.
  • Data Export: One-click export of any search result to Excel.

Admin Capabilities:

  • Correction Tools: Administrators can now delete erroneous transactions directly from the grid.

Version: Items not included above Part 3 of 5
Summary: Advanced Tools: Excel integration, Batch operations, and Undo support.
Details:
Advanced Inventory Management

Batch Operations:

  • Excel Integration: Native import/export support for bulk inventory updates.
  • Mass Entry: Optimized interface for entering hundreds of items quickly.

Safety Nets:

  • Undo Functionality: Accidentally removed an item? The new 'Undo' button restores it instantly.
  • Soft Deletes: Removed items are archived rather than permanently deleted, creating an audit trail.

Version: Items not included above Part 4 of 5
Summary: Inventory Experience: Smart suggestions, animations, and async performance.
Details:
Modernized Inventory Controls

Smart Input Fields:

  • Suggestion Boxes: Replaced slow dropdowns with fast, type-to-search autocomplete fields for Parts and Locations.
  • Color Code Logic: Robust handling of 'Red', 'Blue', and custom color codes.

Responsive UI:

  • Async Operations: Saving and loading data happens in the background - no more screen freezing.
  • Progress Feedback: Visual progress bars show status during complex operations.

Smart Transfers:

  • Visual Cues: Animated arrows indicate stock movement direction (Source ‚Üí Destination).
  • Logic Checks: Prevents transferring more quantity than exists in the source location.

Version: Items not included above Part 5 of 5
Summary: The Foundation: Complete rewrite with .NET 8 and Enterprise Architecture.
Details:
A New Era for MTM WIP

Core Architecture:

  • Modern Stack: Rebuilt from scratch using .NET 8 and C# 12.
  • Secure Data: Moved from direct SQL injection risks to secure Stored Procedures and Data Access Objects (DAOs).
  • Dependency Injection: Modular design makes the app easier to maintain and test.

User Interface Overhaul:

  • Tab-Based Navigation: Replaced clunky MDI windows with a clean, modern tab interface.
  • Theming Engine: Native support for Light, Dark, and High Contrast themes.
  • High DPI Support: Looks crisp on 4K monitors and standard screens alike.
